.. function:: plot_loss_map(data, meta, types=['cold', 'warm', 'coll', 'xrp'], types_to_colour=None, xtick_labels=None, figsize=(20, 10), title=None, x_lim=None, y_lim=[1e-07, 10.0], **kwargs)

   Plots a loss map from data.

   :param data: Series with as index the blms and value the
                measurement [Gy/s]
   :type data: Series
   :param meta: BLM metadata.
   :type meta: DataFrame
   :param xtick_labels: list of BLM names to add to the x
                        axis.
   :type xtick_labels: list, optional
   :param figsize: figure size in inches.
   :type figsize: tuple, optional
   :param title: figure title.
   :type title: str, optional
   :param x_lim: x axis limits.
   :type x_lim: tuple, optional
   :param y_lim: y axis limits.
   :type y_lim: tuple, optional
   :param \*\*kwargs: forwarded to plt.bar.

   :returns: figure and ax objects of the figure.
   :rtype: Figure, Ax
